title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: The New Package Wizard in the Java Project is displaying a confusing message, causing user frustration.
OB: When attempting to create a new package in a Java Project, the New Package Wizard shows a vague error message without specifying the issue. This is confusing for users as they can't identify what's wrong.
EB: The New Package Wizard should provide a clear and informative error message when there is an issue with creating a new package in a Java Project. Users should be able to understand the problem and take appropriate action.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Attempt to create a new package in the project. The confusing error message will be displayed.
